name: Eladrin Elf
Description: Eladrin are elves native to the Feywild, a realm of beauty, unpredictable emotion, and boundless magic. They live in cities on the Plane of Faerie. They are magical in nature and share an interest in the arcane arts.
Age: Although elves reach physical maturity at about the same age as humans, the elven understanding of adulthood goes beyond physical growth to encompass worldly experience. An elf typically claims adulthood and an adult name around the age of 100 and can live to be 750 years old.
Alignment: Elves love freedom, variety, and self-expression, so they lean strongly toward the gentler aspects of chaos. They value and protect others' freedom as well as their own, and they are more often good than not.

Traits.Darkvision: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You canâ€™t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Traits.Keen Senses: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.
Traits.Fey Ancestry: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.
Traits.Trance: Elves don't need to sleep. Instead, they meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day.
Traits.Fey Step: You can cast the misty step spell once using this trait. You regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest.
